Table 48. Personal crimes of violence, 2005:  Percent distribution of multiple-offender victimizations by type of crime, race of victims and perceived race of offenders
Type of crime and race of victim
Note: Detail may not add to total shown because of rounding.
Excluded data on persons of "Other" races and persons indicating two or more races.

a/Includes data on rape and sexual assault, not shown separately.
